stimulusHtml: An ideal massless spring is fixed to the wall at one end, as shown above. A block of mass M attached to the other end of the spring oscillates with amplitude A on a frictionless, horizontal surface. The maximum speed of the block is Vm. The force constant of the spring is
choicesHtml: Mg A MathType@MTEF@5@5@@38E6@

Mg v m 2A MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BE4@

M v m 2 2A MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BD4@

M v m 2 A 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C20@

M v m 2 2 A 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CDC@
